info.title: EMM Restful API
info.description: This is the EMM Restful API

tags.name: Mediapool
tags.description: Everything about mediapool items (Not included in OpenEMM)

tags.name: Reference
tags.description: Everything about references (Not included in OpenEMM)

get.summary: Get a list of all existing mailings

400.description: Any client side error like invalid mailing id or not existing mailing

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

post.description: Write new mailing data. Does not update existing mailing objects.

requestBody.description: Mailing data to add This is the complete EMM mailing JSON object

200.description: Basic mailing information of created mailing

400.description: Any client side error like invalid mailing id or not existing mailing

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid

id.description: Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a predefined id.
Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a predefined id.

target_id.description: If not set or 0 this means "for all recipients"

order.description: Priority order of this content, if multiple targetgroups are matching for this name

text.example: Html content or other text part

component_id.description: Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a predefined id.

type.description: Template(0), Image(1), Attachment(3), PersonalizedAttachment(4), HostedImage(5), PrecAAttachement(7), ThumbnailImage(8)

target_id.description: If not set or 0 this means "for all recipients"

url_id.description: If not set or 0 this means "for all recipients"

bin_block.description: Binary content zipped and coded in base64

mediapoolelement_id.description: Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a predefined id.

category_id.description: Id of the mediapool category to asign this item to

type.description: Template(0), Image(1), Attachment(3), PersonalizedAttachment(4), HostedImage(5), PrecAAttachement(7), ThumbnailImage(8)

content.description: Binary content zipped and coded in base64

mailinglist_id.description: Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a predefined id.

creation_date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

change_date.description: Date-time of latest change (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a change_date.

creation_date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

user_type.description: Letter to identify the recipient type. Default is "W". (ALL_RECIPIENTS("E"), ADMIN_RECIPIENT("A"), TEST_RECIPIENT("T"), TEST_VIP_RECIPIENT("t"), NORMAL_RECIPIENT("W"), NORMAL_VIP_RECIPIENT("w"))

user_status.description: Subscription status of recipient. (Active(1), Bounce(2), AdminOut(3), UserOut(4), WaitForConfirm(5), Blacklisted(6), Suspend(7))

user_remark.description: Descriptive text for this binding entry

entry_mailing_id.description: Mailing id which lead to this subscription

exit_mailing_id.description: Mailing id which lead to this unsubscription

creation_date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

change_date.description: Date-time of change (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

date.description: Date-time of creation (ISO-8601). Only for read methods. Items to create or update may not have a creation_date.

mailinglist_id.description: Numeric ID of the mailinglist to set for this mailing

send_type.description: Type of recipients used for this send action. (WORLD("W"), TEST("T"), ADMIN("A"), DATE_BASED("R"), ACTION_BASED("E"))
Type of recipients used for this send action. (WORLD("W"), TEST("T"), ADMIN("A"), DATE_BASED("R"), ACTION_BASED("E"))
